definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: mother (Ph. [[אם]], Ar. 0’am=a, 0’im=a Eth. 0m:, Sab. [[אם]] (only in n.pr. cf. e. g. Bae:Rel 118) As. ummu COT:Gloss; Aram. [[אֵם]], [[אִימָּא]], 0emo0)—´[[א]] abs. Ge 32:12 +; cstr. Ge 3:20 +; sf. [[אִמִּי]] Ge 20:12 + etc.; † pl. only sf. [[אִמּׂתֵנוּ]] La 5:3; [[אִמּׂתָם]] Je 16:3, La 2:12, La 2:12; —

lit. (human) mother, as parent Ge 20:12, Ge 32:12, Ge 44:20, Ex 2:8, Ps 51:7, Ps 113:9 ( opp. [[עֲקֶרֶת]]) Je 15:8, Je 15:10, Je 20:14, Je 22:26, Je 50:12, 1Ch 4:9, Ct So 6:9, So 8:5 +; hence of Eve [[אֵם]] [[כָּל־חָָי]] Ge 3:20; poet. of birth, [[יׇחָא מִבֶּטֶן אֵם]] Job 1:21, Ec 5:14; [[יׇחָא מֵרֶחֶם אֵם]] Nu 12:12 cf. Ps 139:13 (Je 20:18 &) [[מִמְּעֵי אִמִּי גּוֹוִי]] Ps 71:6 (subj. ´[[י]], cf. [[גחה]] Ps 22:10; > [[גּוֹוִי]] = my benefactor fr. birth Thes Ew Hup Pe); also [[וַתְּהִי אִמִּי קִבְרִי]] Je 20:17; [[מִבֶּטֶן אֵם]] = fr. earliest existence Ju Jdg 16:17, Job 31:18, Ps 22:11; so [[מִמְּעֵי אֵם]] Is 49:1; as giving suck Ct So 8:1 ([[שְׁדֵי אֵם]]) Ps 22:10 cf. Ps 131:2 (v. Ex 2:9 cf. v:Ex 2:8); as exercising authority Ge 21:21, Ge 24:28, Ge 27:11, Ge 27:13, Ge 27:14, Ju Jdg 17:2 f, Ru 1:8, Ct So 3:4, So 8:2 etc.; esp. of queen-mother as possessing dignity & influence 1Ki 1:11, 1Ki 2:13, 1Ki 2:19, 1Ki 2:20, 2Ch 22:2, 2Ch 22:3, Ct So 3:11, Pr 31:1; cf. names of mo-thers of kings of Judah 1Ki 14:21, 1Ki 14:31, 1Ki 15:2, 1Ki 15:10, 1Ki 15:13 +; as shewing love & care 1Sa 2:19, 1Ki 3:27, 1Ki 17:23, 2Ki 4:30, Is 66:13 (sim. of ´[[י]]'s comforting his people; cf. also Ge 27:45); as beloved & lamented 1Ki 19:20 (‖[[אָב]]) Ge 24:67, Ps 35:14; [[בֶּן־אִמּוֹ]] = own (uterine) brother Ge 43:29; & ‖[[אָח]] Ge 27:29, De 13:7, Ju Jdg 8:19, Ps 50:20, Ps 69:9, Ct So 1:6 cf., So 8:1; so [[בַּת־אִמּוֹ]] Le 18:9, Le 20:17, De 27:22 (‖[[בַּת־אָבִיו]]) Ge 20:12; oft. with [[אָב]], as parentes Je 16:3 Zec 13:3; Zec 13:3 Is 8:4; as rightfully claiming honour, authority, etc., cf. supr., Ge 28:7 (P) cf. Ge 37:10 (E) Ju Jdg 14:2 f, so in precept Pr 1:8, Pr 6:20, Pr 10:1, Pr 15:20 etc. cf. Ez Eze 22:7; laws enjoining these Ex 20:12 = De 5:16, Le 19:3 cf. De 22:15; laws prohib. contrary Ex 21:15, Ex 21:17 (E) Le 20:9, Le 20:9 (H) De 21:18, De 21:19, De 27:16; laws as to mourning for Le 21:2, Le 21:11 (H) Nu 6:7 (P) cf. Je 16:7, Ez Eze 44:25; left for wife Ge 2:24; for mother-in-law Ru 2:24; for husband De 21:13 (law for captive women); cf. De 33:9 (of devoted service of Levites); loving, caring for children Pr 4:3 (on the opposite cf. Ps 27:10); loved, cared for Jos 2:13 cf. v:Jos 2:18, Jos 6:23. 1Sa 22:3, 1Ki 19:20 cf. 2Sa 19:38. †

fig. of Deborah as caring for her people [[אֵס בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל]] Ju Jdg 5:7 (cf. [[אָב]] Is 22:21, Job 29:16); so of a city 2Sa 20:19 (‘stock, race, community’ RS:K 28 cf.:Proph. iv. n 8); of Israel Ho 2:4, Ho 2:7, Ho 4:5 cf. Ho 10:14; of Judah Is 50:1, Is 50:1; of Hittite as mother of Jerusalem [[אָבִיךְ הָאֱמׂרִי]] [[וְאִמֵּךְ חִתִּית]] Ez Eze 16:3, Eze 16:45 cf. v:Eze 16:44; v:Eze 16:45; also Eze 19:2, Eze 19:10 & vid. Eze 23:2. †

of animals, dam Ex 22:29 (of ox & sheep) Le 22:27 (of bullock, sheep, or goat); Ex 23:19 = Ex 34:26 = De 14:21 (of kid); mother-bird De 22:6, De 22:6, De 22:7; fig. Job 17:14 :[[לַשַּׁחַת קָרָאתִי אָבִי אָָתָּה אִמִּי וַאֲחׂתִי לָרִמָּֽה ]]. †
= point of departure or division [[אֵם הַדֶּרֶךְ]] Ez Eze 21:26. (‖[[ראׁשׁ שְׁנֵי הַדְּרָכִים]]).
